required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Multicentic Trial in Fertility-sparing Treatment and Ovarian Preservation Management for Early Endometrial Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: The Randomized Multicentic Prospective Controlled Trial in Fertility-sparing Treatment and Ovarian Preservation Management for Early Endometrial Cancer

collaborator.agency: First Hospital of China Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: Through multicenter, prospective, randomized, controlled clinical studies comparing different treatment options (fertility-sparing surgery and ovarian preservation surgery and radical surgery)therapeutic efficacy, safety and quality of life of patients, exploration of the best strategies and risks for the treatment of early endometrial cancer, and promotion and application.

detailed_description.textblock: Patients eligible for enrollment are selected and divided into three groups randomly, including fertility group,ovarian preservation group and endometrial cancer radical surgery group. Take interventions including fertility preservation surgery,ovarian preservation surgery and endometrial cancer radical surgery for patients in different groups respectively. Compare therapeutic efficacy, safety and quality of life of patients to evaluate three treatment and explore the best treatment for clinical application.

primary_outcome.description: calculate the time from patients enter the group to death

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 6 months, 1 year, 2 years, 3 years, 4 years, 5 years
secondary_outcome.description: measure the ovarian volume dynamically by ultrasonography

secondary_outcome.measure: the change of endocrine function evaluation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 6 months, 1 year, 2 years, 3 years, 4 years, 5 years
secondary_outcome.description: measure the endocrine function(hormone level) dynamically by blood detection
calculate the time from patients enter the group to tumor progression

arm_group.description: Endometrial cancer radical surgery to be administered in this arm.
Fertility-sparing surgery to be administered in this arm.
Ovarian preservation surgery to be administered in this arm.

intervention.description: Take endometrectomy , preserve uterus and bilateral ovaries.

facility.name: Shengjing Hospitaol of China Medical University
